# defaultValue

**Instance Property**

The default value of the parameter value.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultValue: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

The parameter assumes this default value when initialized.

## Parameter Attributes

- **minValue**: The minimum value the parameter can take.
- **maxValue**: The maximum value the parameter can take.
